pages.about_cookies_en_403: Cookies on the site: how they work and why they are needed. Cookies, are small text files that a website stores on a user's computer. They play an important role in providing a more convenient and personalized experience on the site. Home About Us Shop Contact us RatnaRustic Cookies on the site: how they work and why they are needed Cookies, are small text files that a website stores on a user's computer. They play an important role in providing a more convenient and personalized experience on the site. Cookies remember certain information about a visitor, such as preferences and settings, and track visitor activity on a website. This allows the site to adapt to user needs, offering more relevant content and functionality. One of the most common types of cookies is session cookies. They are temporarily stored on the user's computer during his visit to the site and are deleted after closing the browser. These cookies allow a website to track which pages a user has visited in order to provide them with a personalized experience within a single session. Another important type of cookie is persistent cookies. They are saved permanently on the user's computer, which allows the site to remember preferences and settings even after closing the browser. Thus, the next time the user visits the site, the user can continue from the point where he left off earlier. Cookies are also often used to track user activity on a website. For example, they can help a site know which pages users have visited, how long they spent on each page, and what actions they took. This information allows the website to analyze and improve its performance and content relevance. Of course, cookies have their advantages and disadvantages.On the one hand, they provide convenience and personalization to users and help websites adapt to their needs. On the other hand, some people are wary of them because of the possibility of surveillance of their online activity. In general, cookies are an integral part of the modern Internet. They allow users to interact with websites more effectively and provide sites with valuable data to improve their performance. It is important to remember that most browsers offer the ability to manage cookies and the user can always configure their use according to their own preferences. pages.about_en_403: About RatnaRustic - Embracing Rajasthan's Jewelry Legacy Since 2020 Home About Us Shop Contact us RatnaRustic Our Story - Crafting Timeless Beauty with Tradition A Tapestry of Tradition: RatnaRustic's Artisanal Journey in Jaipur Welcome to RatnaRustic, where every piece of jewelry is a bridge to the past, anchored in the traditions of a land steeped in color and culture. Founded in the historic city of Jaipur in 2020, our company began as a vision to bring the artisanal crafts of Rajasthan into the modern era. Jaipur, known as the Pink City, with its rich heritage of gemstone craftsmanship and vibrant markets, serves as the perfect backdrop for our creations. The genesis of RatnaRustic The genesis of RatnaRustic was an epiphany that struck our founder, a third-generation jeweler, who saw the changing tides of fashion but realized that the soul of Rajasthani craftsmanship was timeless. With a passion for history and a keen eye for design, our founder set out to create a brand that would honor the old while embracing the new. RatnaRustic was born out of a desire to preserve the ancient jewelry-making traditions of Rajasthan, which have been handed down through artisans from generation to generation. Heritage conservation Our journey began with an exploration into the heart of Rajasthan's jewelry markets, where we handpicked local artisans whose skills had been refined through decades of dedication to their craft. We united their traditional techniques with contemporary design sensibilities to fashion pieces that are both unique and familiar. RatnaRustic is not just about selling jewelry; it's about preserving a heritage and sharing it with the world. Welcome to RatnaRustic – where every jewel tells a story As you explore our "About" page, you are not just reading about a company; you are stepping into a saga of passion for artisanship, commitment to cultural legacy, and the continuous evolution of beauty. pages.index: RatnaRustic: India's Premier Destination for Artisan Cheese Discovery Home About Us Shop Contact us RatnaRustic Vintage Verdure Order Rustic Redefined Order PRODUCT HIGHLIGHTS Pendant "Rajasthan's Crimson Radiance" €300 Necklace "Majestic Maroon Mandala" €450 Jewelry Set "Regal Crimson Coronets" €500 Pendant "Crescent Moon of Jaipur" €280 Earrings "Heavenly Dew" €340 WebShop Treasury of the past At RatnaRustic, we celebrate the timeless allure of antiquity with our exclusive collection of handcrafted jewelry. Our pieces are a homage to the ancient traditions of jewelry making, where every item tells a story of cultural heritage and artisanal skill. We delve into the treasure trove of the past to bring you adornments that are not just accessories, but pieces of history reimagined for the modern connoisseur. More Info Unforgettably Handmade Keeping traditions Unique Stylish Original Amazing Our materials Our materials are sourced with a deep respect for the natural world and its ancient connection to human adornment. We specialize in using naturally occurring coral and garnet, stones known for their vibrant hues and deep symbolic meanings. Each piece of coral is carefully selected for its unique beauty, ensuring that no two pieces are identical. Garnets, treasured for their rich, pomegranate-red luster, add a touch of regal elegance to our creations. Set within the warm embrace of aged silver and bronze, these gems take on a rustic yet refined character that is the signature of RatnaRustic. More Info sense of history The metalwork in our jewelry is as much about the aesthetic as it is about the feel. By employing techniques that have been passed down through generations, our craftsmen give the silver and bronze a distinctive patina that speaks to the wearer and beholder alike. This aged finish not only enhances the depth and beauty of the metal but also ensures that each piece carries with it a sense of history and a connection to the artisans of old. In wearing a RatnaRustic piece, you don a legacy of artistry, the glow of the past, and the promise of an heirloom for the future. pages.privacy_policy_en_403: Privacy Policy | Safeguarding Your Data at RatnaRustic Home About Us Shop Contact us RatnaRustic RatnaRustic's Commitment to Your Privacy Ensuring the Confidentiality and Integrity of Your Personal Information At RatnaRustic, we hold the privacy and security of our patrons' information in the highest regard. This Privacy Policy is designed to communicate our practices regarding the collection, use, and protection of the information you provide. Information Collection Practices In our pursuit to continuously refine our offerings and services, we gather various types of information, which include: Personal Contact Details: Such as your name, email address, and phone number that you may furnish while signing up or making inquiries. Browsing Information: This includes data related to your visits to our website, such as traffic data and your interaction with our site. Transactional Records: We maintain details of the transactions you carry out through our platform, encompassing your purchases and payment details. Utilization of Collected Information The information we gather serves the following purposes: To tailor your browsing experience to your preferences. To improve the range and functionality of our services available via our website. To manage transactions and process orders with efficiency. To engage with you for promotional events, special offers, and updates concerning our unique products. Information Distribution Policies We staunchly oppose the sale, trade, or unwarranted sharing of your identifiable personal information to external entities, with the exception of specific scenarios: When required to align with legal stipulations. To safeguard our rights or our property. To enforce the policies of our website. With our trusted contractors and service providers who contribute to our business operations and are bound by contractual terms to maintain confidentiality and use the information solely for the agreed-upon purposes. Safeguarding Your Data We employ a spectrum of security measures to ensure the protection of your personal details. Nonetheless, it's essential to acknowledge that no mode of data transmission or storage on the internet is infallible. Cookie Usage Our website utilizes cookies to improve the user experience. You retain the ability to adjust your browser settings to decline cookies or to signal when cookies are being issued. Policy Modifications RatnaRustic reserves the discretionary power to amend this privacy policy as needed. Any such changes will be prominently displayed on our website's homepage. Questions and Contact Information Should you have any queries regarding this Privacy Policy, we welcome you to reach out to us at RatnaRustic@gmail.com. pages.products_en_403: Shop Handcrafted Heritage Jewelry at RatnaRustic Home About Us Shop Contact us RatnaRustic Our Cheese Collection: A Tapestry of Elite Flavors Discover Regal Artistry in Every Ornament Welcome to the "Shop" page of RatnaRustic, where each piece of jewelry is a narrative of its own, crafted with the meticulous artistry of our dedicated artisans. As you navigate through our collections, you will find a symphony of age-old traditions and contemporary designs, a curated selection of earrings, pendants, bracelets, beads, necklaces, and brooches. Each category is a testament to the beauty and versatility of our cherished materials: the warmth of aged silver and bronze, alongside the vivid charm of coral and garnet. Our jewelry invites you to explore 'Rajasthan's Crimson Radiance', a pendant that captures the spirit of royal legacies with its intricate workmanship. The 'Majestic Maroon Mandala' necklace is a centerpiece of our collection, offering a glimpse into the soul of traditional mandala artistry with its concentric arrangements of garnets. For those looking to adorn themselves in a suite of coordinated elegance, our 'Regal Crimson Coronets' jewelry set provides a complete and captivating look. And not to be missed, the 'Crescent Moon of Jaipur' pendant, a piece that marries the mystique of the night sky with the allure of ancient Indian lore.
